Precaution_1: You'll need to stay away from school, nursery or work until all the spots have formed a scab. This is usually 5 days after the spots appeared.
Precaution_2: Drink plenty of fluid (try ice lollies if your child is not drinking) to avoid dehydration.
Precaution_3: Use cooling creams or gels from a pharmacy.
Precaution_4: Bathe in cool water and pat the skin dry (do not rub).
